originalText.text: We met with the doctor on December 8, 2023.  He was personable and well prepared for the meeting with sheets that assisted with his explanations.   He explained the situation well and gave us all our options, pros and cons.  I found him to be very knowledgeable, very personable, and just a pleasure to sit with. I would gladly recommend the doctor. Dr. Lin has  a very straightforward approach.

text.text: We met with the doctor on December 8, 2023.  He was personable and well prepared for the meeting with sheets that assisted with his explanations.   He explained the situation well and gave us all our options, pros and cons.  I found him to be very knowledgeable, very personable, and just a pleasure to sit with. I would gladly recommend the doctor. Dr. Lin has  a very straightforward approach.

originalText.text:
Dr Lin works in a subspecialty  of Neurology. The demand for his skill is tremendous, over7million people need to see someone with his skills.  There aren't enough Neurologist to handle the demand.  Dr Lin listens when I talk and explains in a way that a non medical person can understand.  Unlike other doctors he does not stand up while I am talking and moon walk out the door.
I am extremely luck to have him as my doctor.

originalText.text:
Doctor Lin is an extremely empathetic, thorough, and intelligent physician.
He takes his time and really speaks to you And you really feel like you have someone there who will be there for you, and that will help you if and when that time comes. I would definitely recommend him To family and friends.

originalText.text: For me, psychological and memory issues require an MD who is kind, soft spoken, caring and thoughtful.  Dr Lin exudes all of these qualities. I would highly recommend him
